alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:36PM CST until January 29 at 7:48AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Brazos River near West Columbia affecting Brazoria County. Brazos River near Rosharon affecting Brazoria and Fort Bend Counties. Navidad River at Strane Park affecting Jackson County. Trinity River near Moss Bluff affecting Chambers and Liberty Counties. Trinity River at Liberty affecting Liberty County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River near Sweeny affecting Brazoria County. San Bernard River near Boling affecting Brazoria, Fort Bend and Wharton Counties. For the Trinity River...including Crockett, Riverside, Romayor, Goodrich, Liberty, Moss Bluff...Major flooding is forecast. For the Brazos River...including Bryan, West Columbia, US 59, Sugar Land, TX, Hempstead, Bellville, San Felipe, Richmond, Rosharon... Minor flooding is forecast. For the San Bernard River...including East Bernard, Sweeny, Boling... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Navidad River at Strane Park. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding begins threatening livestock and property in the river channel. The right approach to the County Road 401 bridge is closed making travel difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 25.1 feet. - Bankfull Stage is 13.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CST Sunday was 27.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 7.6 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.1 feet on 05/22/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Navidad River Strane Park 24.0 25.1 Sun 7 pm CST 9.8 8.6 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday Morning.Monday morning at 800 AM CST.
